00032 typedef struct {
00033   int* ng;
00034   int* idx;
00035   int* xi;

00039 Parameterization ParameterizationFMDvxz = {
00040   name : "FMDvxz",
00041   Pararead : FMDvxzread,
00042   Parawrite : FMDvxzwrite,
00043   Paraclone : FMDvxzclone,
00044   ParainitSlaterDet : FMDvxzinitSlaterDet,
00045   ParatoSlaterDet : FMDvxztoSlaterDet,
00046   ParaprojectgradSlaterDet : FMDvxzprojectgradSlaterDet

00050 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00051 #define NGAUSS 12

00053 
00054 void FMDvxzclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00055 {
00056   int i;
00057 
00058   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00059   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00060   qp->n = q->n;
00061 
00062   qp->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00063   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00064     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00065 
00066   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00067   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(FMDvxzInternals));
00068   FMDvxzInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
00069   FMDvxzInternals *qint = q->internals;
00070 
00071   qpint->ng = malloc(q->A/2*sizeof(int));
00072   for (i=0; i<q->A/2; i++)
00073     qpint->ng[i] = qint->ng[i];
00074   qpint->idx = malloc(q->A/2*sizeof(int));
00075   for (i=0; i<q->A/2; i++)
00076     qpint->idx[i] = qint->idx[i];
00077   qpint->xi = malloc(q->A/2*sizeof(int));
00078   for (i=0; i<q->A/2; i++)
00079     qpint->xi[i] = qint->xi[i];
00080 
00081 }

00084 #define BUFSIZE 255
00085 
00086 int FMDvxzread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00087 {
00088   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00089   int i;
00090   FMDvxzInternals* qint;
00091 
00092   qint = q->internals = malloc(sizeof(FMDvxzInternals));
00093                                         
00094   do
00095     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00096   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00097   if (feof(fp)) {
00098     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00099     return -1;
00100   }
00101   
00102   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00103 
00104   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00105   if (strcmp(Pname, "FMDvxz")) {
00106     fprintf(stderr, "not a FMDvxz parameter set\n");
00107     return -1;
00108   }
00109   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00110 
00111   // read nucleon parameters
00112   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00113   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00114     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00115     return -1;
00116   }
00117   if (q->A != q->Z+q->N) {
00118     fprintf(stderr, "proton and neutron number don't sum up in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00119             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00120     return -1;
00121   }
00122   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00123   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00124     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00125     return -1;
00126   }
00127 
00128   qint->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A/2*sizeof(int));
00129   qint->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A/2*sizeof(int));
00130   qint->xi = (int*) malloc(q->A/2*sizeof(int));
00131   for (i=0; i<q->A/2; i++) {
00132     qint->idx[i] = 0;
00133     qint->ng[i] = 0;
00134     qint->xi[i] = 0;
00135   }
00136   
00137   q->n = q->ngauss/2*NGAUSS;
00138 
00139   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00140 
00141   int k, xi;
00142   double chi0re, chi0im, chi1re, chi1im;
00143   double are, aim, b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00144   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/2; i++) {
00145     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00146     if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d "
00147                "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00148                &k, &xi, &chi0re, &chi0im, &chi1re, &chi1im, 
00149                &are, &aim, &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 14) {
00150       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00151               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00152       return -1;
00153     }
00154     qint->ng[k]++;
00155     qint->xi[k] = xi;
00156     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = chi0re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = chi0im;
00157     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = chi1re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = chi1im;
00158     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = are;    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = aim;
00159     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = b0im;
00160     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = b1im;
00161     q->x[i*NGAUSS+10] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+11] = b2im;
00162   }     
00163   for (k=1; k<q->A/2; k++) 
00164     qint->idx[k] = qint->idx[k-1]+qint->ng[k-1];
00165 
00166   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00167   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00168     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00169     return -1;
00170   }     
00171 
00172   return 0;
00173 }

00176 int FMDvxzwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00177 {
00178   int k, ki, i;
00179   FMDvxzInternals* qint = q->internals;
00180 
00181   fprintf(fp, "<Para FMDvxz %s>\n", q->name);
00182 
00183   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00184   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00185 
00186   for (k=0; k<q->A/2; k++)
00187     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++) {
00188       i = qint->idx[k]+ki;
00189       fprintf(fp,
00190               "%2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00191               k, qint->xi[k],
00192               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1],
00193               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3],
00194               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5],
00195               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7],
00196               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9],
00197               q->x[i*NGAUSS+10], q->x[i*NGAUSS+11]);
00198   }
00199   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00200 
00201   return 0;
00202 }

00205 void FMDvxzinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00206 {
00207   int k, ki;
00208   FMDvxzInternals* qint = q->internals;
00209 
00210   Q->A = q->A; 
00211   Q->Z = q->Z; 
00212   Q->N = q->N;
00213   Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00214 
00215   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00216   for (k=0; k<q->A/2; k++)
00217     Q->idx[k] = qint->idx[k];
00218   for (k=0; k<q->A/2; k++)
00219     Q->idx[k + q->A/2] = qint->idx[k] + q->ngauss/2;
00220 
00221   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00222   for (k=0; k<q->A/2; k++)
00223     Q->ng[k] = qint->ng[k];
00224   for (k=0; k<q->A/2; k++)
00225     Q->ng[k + q->A/2] = qint->ng[k];
00226 
00227   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00228   for (k=0; k<q->A/2; k++) 
00229     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00230       Q->G[qint->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00231   for (k=0; k<q->A/2; k++) 
00232     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00233       Q->G[qint->idx[k]+ki + q->ngauss/2].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00234 }

00236 
00237 void FMDvxztoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00238 {
00239   FMDvxzInternals* qint = q->internals;
00240 
00241   int i;
00242 
00243   complex double chiu, chid, a, bx, by, bz;
00244 
00245   // the nucleons
00246   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/2; i++) {
00247     chiu = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1];
00248     chid = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3];
00249     a =    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5];
00250     bx =   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7];
00251     by =   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9];
00252     bz =   q->x[i*NGAUSS+10] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+11];
00253 
00254     Q->G[i].chi[0] = chiu;
00255     Q->G[i].chi[1] = chid;
00256     Q->G[i].a      = a;
00257     Q->G[i].b[0]   = bx;
00258     Q->G[i].b[1]   = by;
00259     Q->G[i].b[2]   = bz;
00260 
00261     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/2].chi[0] = -chid;
00262     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/2].chi[1] = chiu;
00263     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/2].a      = a;
00264     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/2].b[0]   = bx;
00265     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/2].b[1]   = -by;
00266     Q->G[i + q->ngauss/2].b[2]   = bz;
00267 
00268   }
00269 }

00271 
00272 void FMDvxzprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00273                                 const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00274 {
00275   FMDvxzInternals* qint = q->internals;
00276   int i;
00277 
00278   // gradients with respect to nucleons
00279 
00280   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/2; i++) {
00281     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].chi[0]);
00282     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].chi[0]);
00283     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].chi[1]);
00284     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].chi[1]);
00285     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].a);
00286     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].a);
00287     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
00288     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
00289     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
00290     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
00291     dq[i*NGAUSS+10] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
00292     dq[i*NGAUSS+11] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
00293   }
00294 
00295   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss/2; i++) {
00296     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].chi[1]);
00297     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].chi[1]);
00298     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] += -2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].chi[0]);
00299     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] += -2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].chi[0]);
00300     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].a);
00301     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].a);
00302     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].b[0]);
00303     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].b[0]);
00304     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8] += -2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].b[1]);
00305     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9] += -2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].b[1]);
00306     dq[i*NGAUSS+10] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].b[2]);
00307     dq[i*NGAUSS+11] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i + q->ngauss/2].b[2]);
00308   }
00309 
00310 }
